mapper.select: SELECT mem_id as memId , mem_pw as memPw , mem_name as memName , 'mem' grade , mem_email as userEmail , mem_email_conf as userEmailCheck FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId} UNION SELECT emp_id as memId , emp_pw as memPw , emp_name as memName , 'emp' grade , emp_email as userEmail , 'T' userEmailCheck FROM employee WHERE emp_id = #{memId}
